alert.note: Alert for Douglas (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 14 at 6:26PM CDT until April 15 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATTAMIE...SARPY AND EASTERN DOUGLAS COUNTIES... At 625 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over eastern Omaha, moving northeast at 35 mph. Additional strong to possibly severe storms are moving into the warned area from the south. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Eppley Airfield, Florence and Council Bluffs Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
